results.name: Triangle read by rows giving number of rooted labeled trees with n >= 2 nodes and height d >= 1.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 2..101, flattened

Index entries for sequences related to trees
maple: gf:= proc(k) gf(k):= `if`(k=0, x, x*exp(gf(k-1))) end:
A:= proc(n, k) A(n, k):= n!*coeff(series(gf(k), x, n+1), x, n) end:
seq(seq(T(n, d), d=1..n-1), n=2..12);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 21 2012
mathematica: gf[k_] := gf[k] = If[k == 0, x, x*E^gf[k - 1]]; a[n_, k_] := n!*Coefficient[ Series[gf[k], {x, 0, n + 1}], x, n]; t[n_, d_] := a[n, d] - a[n, d - 1]; Table[t[n, d], {n, 2, 12}, {d, 1, n - 1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 15 2013, translated from _Alois P. Heinz_'s Maple program *)
